Class PlayerBoardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.sw2019.view.gui.PlayerBoardController

extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for MyPlayerBoardGroup and PlayerBoardGroup
    Author:
    lentinip

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initializes the structures needed in the class

      • configurePlayerBoard

        public void configurePlayerBoard(java.lang.String username,
                                 Character character,
                                 boolean isFirst)
        Method that needs to be called after the controller is instantiated if the group is a PlayerBoardGroup.
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player owner of the playerboard
        character - character of the player owner of the playerboard
        isFirst - true if the player owner of the playerboard is first, false otherwise

      • configureMyPlayerBoard

        public void configureMyPlayerBoard(Client client,
                                   Character character,
                                   boolean isFirst)
        Method that needs to be called after the controller is instantiated if the group is a MyPlayerBoardGroup.
        Parameters:
        client - reference to the Client instance
        character - character of the player of the client
        isFirst - true if the player of the client is first, false otherwise

      • updateAmmo

        public void updateAmmo(int blue,
                       int red,
                       int yellow)
        Updates the showing ammo of the player
        Parameters:
        blue - number of blue ammo that the player has
        red - number of red ammo that the player has
        yellow - number of yellow ammo that the player has

      • initializeMySkulls

        public void initializeMySkulls()
        Puts the skulls in a List and set them not visible

        owner - Character owner of the token

      • setFrenzyMode

        public void setFrenzyMode(boolean beforeFirst)
        Manages the frenzyMode in the playerBoard
        Parameters:
        beforeFirst - true if the player has the beforeFirst actions, false if has the afterFist

      • initializePlayerHand

        public void initializePlayerHand(java.lang.String username)
        Loads the OtherPlayerHandScreen and sets the parameters so that the player can choose to open the window in a next moment.
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player owner of the playerBoard.

      • setAsCurrentPlayer

        public void setAsCurrentPlayer()
        Shows the player owner of the playerBoard as the current player using an effect

      • removeAsCurrentPlayer

        public void removeAsCurrentPlayer()
        Disables the effects on the playerBoardImage.

      • showPlayerPrivateHand

        public void showPlayerPrivateHand(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent actionEvent)
        Shows the playerHandStage
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - actionEvent caught

      • updatePlayerBoard

        public void updatePlayerBoard(PlayerBoardMessage playerBoardMessage)
        Updates the playerboard using a playerBoardMessage. Checks if the playerBoardMessage is the same as the one arrived before.
        Parameters:
        playerBoardMessage - playerBoardMessage with the data for the update

      • updatePlayerHand

        public void updatePlayerHand(PlayerHand playerHand)
        Updates the otherPlayerHandController
        Parameters:
        playerHand - playerHand message with the data for the update

      • updateSequence

        public void updateSequence(java.util.List<javafx.scene.image.ImageView> sequence,
                           java.util.List<Character> characters)
        Updates the damage sequence or the mark sequence using the characters received from the playerBoardMessage
        Parameters:
        sequence - list of ImageViews (damageSequence or markSequence)
        characters - list of Characters from the playerBoardMessage

      • updateNumberOfDeaths

        public void updateNumberOfDeaths(int numberOfDeaths)
        Shows a skull for each number of deaths of the player owner of the playerBoard. If the number of deaths of the player is bigger than the number of skulls it shows only 6 skulls
        Parameters:
        numberOfDeaths - number of deaths of the player owner of the playerBoard.

      • updateFlipped

        public void updateFlipped()
        Updates the group to show the flipped board and hides the skulls

      • showActionTile

        public void showActionTile()
        Shows the action tile (required if the mode is frenzy and the board is flipped). If the areActionsAvailable is true calls showPossibleActions(canIShoot).

      • getCharacter

        public Character getCharacter()

      • showPossibleActions

        public void showPossibleActions(boolean canIShoot)
        Shows the Panes with which the player can choose the action to do. Manages the canIShoot boolean and the frenzy mode
        Parameters:
        canIShoot - true if the player can shoot

      • disableActions

        public void disableActions()
        Hides all the Panes for the actions.

      • showReload

        public void showReload()
        If is not the frenzy mode shows only the reload Pane

        Parameters:
